document.full_text: a year after the worst u.s. offshore oil spill swamped the gulf coast with petroleum and misery, louisiana officials on wednesday declared the hard-hit region reborn.
document.title: gulf gets taste of recovery one year after spill
lines_and_colors: a year after the worst u.s. offshore oil spill swamped the gulf coast with petroleum and misery, louisiana officials on wednesday declared the hard-hit region reborn.
